verbs.description: [ARG1: Novelist Philip Roth] , [R-ARG1: who] [V: passed] away [ARGM-TMP: at the age of 85] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , called President Donald Trump a con artist in a recent email discussing his book " The Plot Against America . "

[ARG0: Novelist Philip Roth , who passed away at the age of 85 on Tuesday ,] [V: called] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: a con artist] [ARGM-LOC: in a recent email discussing his book " The Plot Against America] . "
